meanings.definition: A bridge connecting two buildings at an elevated height.
meanings.sent1: The skybridge between the two towers allowed people to walk from one building to the other without going down.
meanings.sent2: I crossed the skybridge to get from the hotel to the convention center.
meanings.sent3: The pigeons on the skybridge were having a meeting about the best flight routes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a skybridge, connecting her eyes to her laughter.
meanings.sent5: The glass walls of the skybridge offered a breathtaking view of the city below.

meanings.definition: A structure that spans across a gap or obstacle in the sky.
meanings.sent1: The airplane flew under the skybridge, creating a stunning sight.
meanings.sent2: The skybridge over the canyon was a marvel of engineering.
meanings.sent3: The clouds seemed to be playing tag around the skybridge.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a skybridge, bridging the gap between the two friends.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow arched over the skybridge, adding a magical touch to the scene.
